query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pickingOrders) as pedidos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pickingWaves) as ondas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pickingWaveItems) as itens_onda,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pickingReservations) as reservas;
